tool.name: GroupByBed

param.name: cols
param.label: Specify the column(s) (comma separated) that should be summarized

param.name: group
param.label: Specifies which column(s) (1-based) should be used to group the input. Columns may be comma-separated with each column must be explicitly listed. Or, ranges (e.g. 1-4) are also allowed.

param.name: operation
param.label: Specify the operation
param.option: Freqasc - print a comma separated list of values observed and the number of times they were observed. Reported in ascending order of frequency*
Freqdesc - - print a comma separated list of values observed and the number of times they were observed. Reported in descending order of frequency*
